Articles.Content:
Station Sky Sword - The incident

Chapter 1

Saturday 26th June

2:35 Am

T- 36.25.00

In a dark room somewhere near the headquarters of the United Nations of Kerbin, 5 men in black suits are settling down, all very tired. The Dr. ////// stands up and starts talking:

Dr. ////// - Gentlemen, thank you for gathering upon such a short notice, but we are faced with a matter of great importance.

Admiral ////// - What could possibly be so important as to having us all forced out of bed?

Dr. ////// - It has been two days since we last heard from Sky Sword...

Admiral ////// - WHAT ?

President ////// - Excuse me but exactly what is Sky Sword ?

Dr. ////// - Sky Sword is the pinnacle of all our technological advances in the past ten years, technological progress beyond all clearance levels.

President ////// - Why have I not been informed of this ?

Dr. ////// - The nature of Sky Sword makes it so that the more one knows about it, the less one would wish to.

President ////// - Then why have you brought me in today ?

Dr. ////// - Because what I am about to suggest requires your approval...

Admiral ////// - Proceed...

Dr. ////// - Because of the nature of the content of station Sky Sword, we cannot afford any security breaches, but now that we have lost contact with the station, we have all the reason to believe that something has gone terribly wrong. Which leads us to why I have called you in, Mr. .

Mr. ////// - Why ? I don't see why I have anything to do with this... The only thing I do is build rockets...

Dr. ////// - That is exactly why I have brought you into this meeting. Tell me, how fast can you build a rocket capable of low Kerbin orbit ?

Mr. ////// - Approximately 30 hours if we rush it, and thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s without testing the thing....

Dr. ////// - Good. This bring us to you Mr. ////// , your leading position in the Kerbal Space Program being what has brought you in here today. When is the next open launch window?

Mr. ////// - I believe there is an emergency launch window open in 33 hours...

Dr. //////- That fits in perfectly...

Admiral ////// - But what is it that you want to do Dr. //////?

Dr. //////- I want to send up a task force to Sky Sword, and figure out what has happened. Now lets get planing shall we ?

***********************************************************************************************************

Edited June 26, 2013 by EnhancedCookie

Can I suggest editing the title to show this is a work in progres? So people know why it's still incomplete looking.
